"Ingstad": "Goodness, this campsite is perfect. There are many old structures remaining that can be put to various uses."
"The weather is harsh, yes, but here the troops can get some rest."
"My name's Ingstad. I'm one of the logistics guys for this vanguard unit."
"If you don't mind, there's a favour or two I'd like to ask of you. I'd really appreciate the help."
"We've already restored part of the facilities, but we're going to need a steady supply of foodstuffs if that's to continue."
"Might I ask you to lend a hand with this? If you could source us some Nourishing Kvaris Sea Snails, it'd be most appreciated."
"For an ARKS who spends the most time in the heat of battle outside, you may not be very familiar with this, but..."
"Our way of life really hinges on the agriculture and industrial production that happens behind the scenes."
"From what I can see, these buildings are of similar construction to Central City. A little busted up, but repairs were easy enough."
"Kvaris is an incredibly unforgiving land. The best way to support the troops is to first secure a reliable source of food."
"We've already restored part of the facilities, but we're going to need a steady supply of foodstuffs if that's to continue."
"Might I ask you to lend a hand with this? If you could source us some Nourishing Kvaris Sea Snails, it'd be most appreciated."
"You're too busy? Of course, I understand. We could really use your help, so please let me know when you get some time."
"Welcome back. Did you get those Nourishing Kvaris Sea Snails?"
"Give 10 Nourishing Kvaris Sea Snails"
"Return"
"Ah, this will be plenty. They're quite big and healthy, so you'll hear no complaints from me."
"Goodness, I'm so happy! Thank you very much."
"Everyone will be thrilled to start having good meals for a change."
"Mmm, I don't think that will be enough. Could you go and gather some more? Thanks."
"...Ah, I see. Well, come back when you're able."
"Thanks very much again for those snails."
"Actually, I was hoping you'd be free to find us another source of food. Could I trouble you again?"
"This time, I'd like you to find some Healthy Kvaris Lobsters."
"In a land as bitterly cold as this, the lobsters and the snails are invaluable sources of protein."
"You should be able to find Healthy Kvaris Lobsters in... Southern Kvaris, I think."
"Really sorry for troubling you, but it's greatly appreciated. Just take care of yourself out there."
"You're too busy? Of course, I understand. We could really use your help, so please let me know when you get some time."
"Welcome back. Did you get the Healthy Kvaris Lobsters?"
"Give 10 Healthy Kvaris Lobsters"
"Return"
"Ah, this amount will be perfect."
"Whoa! They're quite lively, aren't they!"
"Not a problem at all. Goodness, thanks again so very much."
"I'm going to try to make these available to the troops as soon as possible."
"Mmm, I don't think that will be enough. Could you go and gather some more? Thanks."
"...Ah, I see. Well, come back when you're able."
"Thanks again for getting us the lobsters."
"I'm going to try to make these available to the troops as soon as possible."
"The food you sourced for us has been growing nicely. They've been reproducing at a favorable pace as well."
"I would, however, like to ask you to source some more food supplies. Would that be okay?"
"Since we last spoke, the repairs on the underground plant have proceeded most favorably, and it can now support more ingredients."
"At this rate, we might even be able to give Central a run for their money. ...Okay, that was a bit of an exaggeration, but still."
"Anyhow, I'd like to ask you to source us some vegetables. Specifically some Healthy Kvaris Onions, if you don't mind."
"Healthy Kvaris Onions are native to Central Kvaris. Thanks again."
"You're too busy? Of course, I understand. We could really use your help, so please let me know when you get some time."
"Welcome back. Did you get the Healthy Kvaris Onions?"
"Give 10 Healthy Kvaris Onions"
"Return"
"Ah, this amount will be perfect!"
"Yes, these are fine looking specimens. They look easy to cultivate, as well."
"Hehe... I'm just imagining how the troops' faces will light up when they smell some delicious onion soup."
"Thank you very much once again. Alright, I've got some work to do!"
"Mmm, I don't think that will be enough. Could you go and gather some more? Thanks."
"...Ah, I see. Well, come back when you're able."
"We are now able to start supplying the troops with our own ingredients cultivated from your original provisions."
"I can't express how happy it's made everyone. I just want to thank you once again."
"If you don't mind, there's a couple more ingredients I'd like you to source for us. Would you mind?"
"Goodness, thank you so much. You've been such a big help."
"Alright, what I need you to next is source us some Refreshing Kvaris Napa."
"The wider variety of vegetables available to us, the more nutritious food we can make to support our troops."
"Sorry for troubling you even more, but it's greatly appreciated."
"You're too busy? Of course, I understand. We could really use your help, so please let me know when you get some time."
"Welcome back. Did you get some Refreshing Kvaris Napa?"
"Give Refreshing Kvaris Napa"
"Return"
"You certainly did, I see. Thank you very much!"
"Oh, these look really juicy. Once they mature, they should also produce an ample amount of seeds."
"Goodness, you've helped us out again! I hope I'll be able to rely on you again in future."
"Mmm, I don't think that will be enough. Could you go and gather some more? Thanks."
"...Ah, I see. Well, come back when you're able."
"Goodness, thanks to your wonderful help, progress on the undergound plant has been proceeding apace."
"Ingredient management, equipment maintenance, left-over repairs, you name it. We've been quite busy over here."
"Ah, yes. If you don't mind, would it be alright to ask you to source another ingredient for us?"
"Lately, I've been told that the troops have been craving for fruit."
"After all, what better way to enliven a meal than by following it with a fruity dessert?"
"I know I've already asked much of you, but we'd all really appreciate it."
"You're too busy? Of course, I understand. We could really use your help, so please let me know when you get some time."
"Welcome back. Did you get some Sharp Kvaris Guava?"
"Give 10 Sharp Kvaris Guava"
"Return"
"Wow, those look delicious!"
"They look to have plenty of seeds, besides. With these, we'll have no problem cultivating some."
"I don't know how to possibly thank you enough for all the help you've been..."
"Thanks to you, our troops don't have to worry about their next meal. We're all incredibly thankful."
"Oh, I know. I'm pretty confident in my cooking, so let me treat you to a meal some time. I insist!"
"Mmm, I don't think that will be enough. Could you go and gather some more? Thanks."
"...Ah, I see. Well, come back when you're able."
"I don't know how to possibly thank you enough for all the help you've been..."
"Thanks to you, our troops don't have to worry about their next meal. We're all incredibly thankful."
"Oh, I know. I'm pretty confident in my cooking, so let me treat you to a meal some time. I insist!"
